name: Formigas
tagline: From the initial idea to the successful marketing.
description:
Since 2010, Formigas GmbH has been developing and merchandising its own customized apps for iOS, Android and Windows phone devices. The company places great importance on innovative developments and the resulting added value for their users. In their daily work and during the realization of these projects, customer-oriented thinking is always one of the most important aspects of the company's approach.
To implement their goals and the wishes of their customers, Formigas always works together as one team, as their company name suggests. (In Portuguese, Formigas is the word for a colony of ants.)
